abstract: Top stories in the news today.
snippet: Top stories in the news today.
lead_paragraph: As the Telangana region of Andhra Pradesh entered its 20th day of general strikes demanding a separate state, the Congress party still seemed unclear about its stance on the matter. After touring and meeting with representatives from the three regions of the state, the union minister for health and family welfare has recommended "more talks." K Chandrashekhar Rao, the leader of the separatist party Telangana Rashtriya Samithi, staged a sit-in at Rajghat on Gandhi Jayanti in Delhi this weekend (NDTV).

headline.main: Newswallah: In the English-Language Press Monday
